doc:
Michael Craze https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Craze 0 Michael Craze (29 November 1942 – 8 December 1998) was a British actor noted for his role of Ben Jackson, a companion of the Doctor, in the long-running BBC science fiction television series Doctor Who. He played the part from 1966 to 1967 alongside both William Hartnell and Patrick Troughton. Michael_Craze ( 29_November_1942 – 8_December_1998 ) was a_British_actor noted for his_role of Ben_Jackson , a_companion of the_Doctor , in the_long-running_BBC_science_fiction_television_series_Doctor Who . He played the_part from 1966 to 1967 alongside both William_Hartnell and Patrick_Troughton .
